description: Verify visibility of key elements on the login page.
expected_result: Email field, Password field, Login button, 'Forgot?' link, and 'Sign Up' link are visible.

description: Verify the login button is initially disabled.
Attempt login with empty email and password fields.
expected_result: Error messages are displayed for both email and password fields.

description: Attempt login with an invalid email format.
expected_result: Error message is displayed for the email field indicating invalid format.
Password field input type changes to 'text' and back to 'password' on subsequent clicks.
Sign-up page is displayed with relevant fields and buttons.

description: Verify carousel navigation functionality on the homepage.
expected_result: Carousel slides to the next image.

description: Verify search input functionality on the homepage.
expected_result: Search input field displays the entered text.

description: Verify category navigation functionality on the homepage.
expected_result: Navigates to the groceries category page (or displays relevant products).

description: Verify the 'View All' button functionality on product sections.
